forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 27F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 51F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 26F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.
